body: I don't ship them but god do I love reading hentai stuff about those two, it's always so hot and cute all at once.
Can we get more Lightning and Hope please
I've been waiting a long time to see this translated, finally ~
@Shady Individual: They're actually a quite famous couple though. If you play XIII-2 you can see the older version of Hope, or just simple visit the wikia.
So I just started playing FF13 and I didn't expect that little dumb white emo kid (Hope) to actually fuck someone and it's Lightning for fuck's sake. People with their imagination, huh.
